content:
Can anyone point me to an example of an IG that mandated support of $export in the Capability Statement?
Is $export widely supported by FHIR servers?
@Saul Kravitz The only IG I had seen it: Bulk Data Access IG
In the US this IG waa named in ONC's final rule this year; certified electronic health record products will need to implement and deploy this functionality in response (by 2023).
